grand theft auto iii  definitive edition is an exercise in frustration and disappointment the game quickly devolves into an incredibly tedious experience largely due to its mission design which offers neither creativity nor player freedom compounding this is the undeniably janky gameplay many moments are very difficult not in a rewarding way but in a way that feels unfair and poorly implemented the only glimmer of value lies in its contribution to the broader gta lore
